item.description:
The Institute of Contemporary Art strives to share the pleasures of reflection, inspiration, provocation, and imagination that contemporary art offers through public access to art, artists, and the creative process.

ICA has free admission on Thursdays and I have been to this place long back and it is definitely a good place to enjoy art and views of Boston from harbor.

It will take like 60-90 min to cover all the art work ( excluding their documentaries of art). We can have dinner if interested.

You can join anytime after 5.30 and I am sure it will be very easy for people who work in Boston area. If you have any questions please call and leave voice message at 617-506-9712 and I will return your call.


more http://www.icaboston....
item.name: ICA free thursday
